refsect2.title: idmef_value_new_enum ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_new_enum (idmef_value_t **value, idmef_class_id_t classid, const char *buf);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_new_enum_from_string ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_new_enum_from_string (idmef_value_t **value, idmef_class_id_t classid, const char *buf);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_new_enum_from_numeric ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_new_enum_from_numeric (idmef_value_t **value, idmef_class_id_t classid, int val);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_new_from_string ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_new_from_string (idmef_value_t **value, idmef_value_type_id_t type, const char *buf);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_set_enum ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_set_enum (idmef_value_t *value, idmef_class_id_t classid, const char *buf);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_set_enum_from_numeric ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_set_enum_from_numeric (idmef_value_t *value, idmef_class_id_t classid, int no);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_set_enum_from_string ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_set_enum_from_string (idmef_value_t *value, idmef_class_id_t classid, const char *buf);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_iterate ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_iterate (const idmef_value_t *value, int (*callback) (idmef_value_t *ptr, void *extra), void *extra);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_iterate_reversed ()
refsect2.programlisting: int idmef_value_iterate_reversed (const idmef_value_t *value, int (*callback) (idmef_value_t *ptr, void *extra), void *extra);

refsect2.title: idmef_value_match ()
refsect2.para: Match val1 and val2 using op .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the number of match, 0 for none, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_check_operator ()
refsect2.para: Check whether op can apply to value .

entry.para: Type of operator to check value for.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_get_applicable_operators ()
refsect2.para: Store all operator supported by value in result .

entry.para: Pointer where the result will be stored.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_value_destroy ()
refsect2.para: Decrement refcount and destroy value if it reach 0.
